程序包的使用
org.giiwa.web

使用org.giiwa.web的程序包
程序包
说明
org.giiwa.app.web

org.giiwa.web
 
org.giiwa.web.view
 
  • org.giiwa.app.web使用的org.giiwa.web中的类
    类
    说明
    Controller
    the Controller Class is base controller, all class that provides web api should inherit it
    it provides api mapping, path/method mapping, contains all the parameters from the request, and contains all key/value will be pass to view.
    IListener
    the life listener which will be invoked when the system "start", "stop"
    the life listener is configured in module.xml
    Module
    module includes: a module.xml, a group of model/view/images/css/js/language, etc. and it will handle the request, if not found the handler in the module, then will let the parent to handle it the module organized as a chain, the home module will handler first, if found then stop, else parent or parent's parent this purpose of module is reuse the module with only changing of configuration file
    Path
    the Path annotation interface used to define a Web api, for each annotated method, the framework will auto generate the web api mapping for the method,
    the whole web api uri should be= http://[host]/[classname]/[method path], method including:

  • org.giiwa.web使用的org.giiwa.web中的类
    类
    说明
    Controller
    the Controller Class is base controller, all class that provides web api should inherit it
    it provides api mapping, path/method mapping, contains all the parameters from the request, and contains all key/value will be pass to view.
    Controller.HttpMethod
    set the current module
    Controller.NameValue
    the NameValue Class used to contain the name and value
    Language
    language data which located at /modules/[module]/i18n/
    Module
    module includes: a module.xml, a group of model/view/images/css/js/language, etc. and it will handle the request, if not found the handler in the module, then will let the parent to handle it the module organized as a chain, the home module will handler first, if found then stop, else parent or parent's parent this purpose of module is reuse the module with only changing of configuration file
    PageLabel
     
    PageLink
     
    Path
